Message #5 le 2013-3-7 @ 21:05:16 par Scriibe:
CSE Teaser 3: Camelot Unchained
http://citystateentertainment.com/camelotunchained/


Je crois que c'est bien de préciser que Curious Factory n'est publisher/localisation que pour l'asie seulement, CSE demeure le publisher pour USA/Euro.
Quote: They are simply helping us promote CSE/CU Kickstarter in Asia and Europe, that's why they are a "Publishing Partner" and not the publisher. :) We are currently self-publishing the game in the US and Europe and, as I've posted before this, we are talking to some folks in Asia about possible distribution deals down the road. CF is a contractor/partner for us, not the other way around.

As per our website:
...to help promote CSE and its Kickstarter for Camelot Unchained Â™ (working title) throughout Asia and Europe.

Besides, if you look at the release, it describes what CF doe "CuriousFactory offers support for developers who want to challenge the world with their innovative ideas, specializing in crowd funding. CuriousFactory also provides marketing, PR and community management and localization support for clients who want to take their crowdfunding project global."
So, think of this announcement as the same as us announcing a deal with a PR company but with a few other benefits such as localization, especially for Asia.
http://www.mmorpg.com/discussion2.cfm/post/5600824#5600824
Quote: Originally posted by MarkJacobs

They work for us. :)

No publisher = good for us. Un quote récent d'un entrevue:" I am tired of making someone else's game (EA), I want to make MY game.
Ce site Web est une version en lecture seule du contenu généré par notre communauté depuis 2008.
